General.Name: Pegavision
General.Description: Pegavision Corporation manufactures and sells medical devices, and optical and precision instruments in Taiwan. It offers soft contact lenses for OEM customers and wearers. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Taoyuan City, Taiwan. Pegavision Corporation is a subsidiary of Kinsus Interconnect Technology Corp.
General.Address: No.5, Shing Yeh Street, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 333

2.Name: Mr. Tony  Wang
2.Title: CFO, Director of Fin. & Accounting Division and Corp. Governance Officer
